title: The Apprentice's Nick Hewer is Sugar-free and going back to the basics of business
text: The Apprentice's Nick Hewer is Sugar-free and going back to the basics of business Lord Sugar's former sidekick on BBC's The Apprentice talks to Rebecca Burn-Callander about life beyond TV Photo: Ken McKay/Rex Features
